speaker: agent
text: Okay, give me one second to pull up a form.

text: And do you have an account with us?

text: Well, on the north side of our building, this is a steel warehouse on the [LOCATION] [LOCATION].

speaker: agent
text: And really it needs to be reset, reculked and the whole thing.
